---
title: "Review and fix early access functionality"
labels: bug, P1-high
---

## Problem

The early access feature needs to be tested and verified to ensure it is working correctly.

## Tasks

- [ ] Identify where the early access feature is implemented in the codebase
- [ ] Test the early access functionality end-to-end
- [ ] Document what "early access" covers and expected behavior
- [ ] Fix any issues found during testing

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Early access flow tested and documented
- [ ] All identified bugs fixed
- [ ] Behavior matches intended design
